target.name: run-bigfish-compression
target.description: this command compress the JS/CSS file

macrodef.name: yuicompressor
macrodef.description: Runs the YUI JS/CSS compressor on the specified inFile and saves the output to outFile

macrodef.name: mergeFile
macrodef.description: add/remove the nodes from second file with compare of first file

macrodef.name: customizeMergeFile
macrodef.description: add the nodes from first file with compare of second file, Currently this is only support the reader attribute see ofbiz-component.xml entity-resource

target.name: run-bigfish-merge
target.description: merge the XML/PROPERTIE file base on passed key values

target.name: run-bigfish-merge-preserve
target.description: merge the XML/PROPERTIE file base on passed key values but preserve extra values

macrodef.name: createToFile
macrodef.description: copy the file to toFile path if toFile not exist

target.name: create-ofbiz-patches
target.description: Creates patch for framework, application, specialpurpose components

target.name: revert-ofbiz-patches
target.description: Remove any local change in the files or any previously applied local patch.

target.name: apply-ofbiz-patches
target.description: Apply the patch to framework, application, specialpurpose components.

target.name: reapply-ofbiz-patches
target.description: First removes any previously applied patch and then applies the new patch
